import{coerce,z}from'zod';import{zodResolver}from'@hookform/resolvers/zod';import{set,useForm}from'react-hook-form';import{API_URL}from'../../url';import HeaderComponente from'../../componetes/header/headerComponente';import CadCategoria from'../../componetes/cad_categoria/cad_categoria';import CadItens from'../../componetes/cad_itens/cadItens';import"./itens.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Itens(){const[formSelecionado,setFormSelecionado]=useState(null);const selecionarFormulario=formId=>setFormSelecionado(formId);useEffect(()=>{selecionarFormulario(1);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeaderComponente,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"itens-title",children:"Sistema de Itens"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"alinhar-menu",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"style-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"alinhar-menu",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-itens",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>selecionarFormulario(1),children:"Itens"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>selecionarFormulario(2),children:"Categorias"})]})}),formSelecionado==1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CadItens,{})}),formSelecionado==2&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CadCategoria,{})})]})})]})});}export default Itens;
